title: The Independent Bank of England--20 Years On
content: For release on delivery  10:00 a.m. EDT (3:00 p.m. local time) September 28, 2017 Revised version: October 12, 2017  The Independent Bank of England--20 Years On  Remarks by  Stanley Fischer  Vice Chairman  Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System  at  “20 Years On,” a conference sponsored by  the Bank of England  London, England  September 28, 2017 Revised version: October 12, 2017  Vice Chairman Fischer updated his remarks to elaborate on topics raised at the Bank of  England conference for which the speech was originally prepared.
